wikipedia_page.main: John Vaughan  (1863 – 1952) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1885 and 1886, playing 4 matches and scoring 1 goal. He played his first match on 11 April 1885 against Ireland and his last match on 10 April 1886 against Scotland.
